References

   
Module HarmonixMidi
Header /Engine/Plugins/Runtime/Harmonix/Source/HarmonixMidi/Public/HarmonixMidi/MidiFile.h
Include #include "HarmonixMidi/MidiFile.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (BlueprintType, Category="Music", Meta=(DisplayName="Standard MIDI File"))  
class UMidiFile :  
    public UObject,  
    public IAudioProxyDataFactory

Remarks

An FMidFile is primarily a container for FMidiTracks.

This class can handle loading and saving standard midi files, as well as serializing itself to standard Unreal Engine FArchives.
